term: What trouble is on the foreign front?
content:
jefferson is going to advocate free trade and free seatings(?)
we have declared our neutrality, and so as long as we are trading normal food stuff and normal stuff and not war stuff, we are allowed to trade with anyone

over time, napoleon is going to gain control over europe and cut britain off from trade with the rest of the world

the british is going to do the same and cut off the french from the rest of the world
